description.lang: The IZE Extender is the only Smart Home Hub on the market that connects to the TV screen to overlay its content and digital notifications.The design and placement optimization of multiple antennas (Z-Wave, ZigBee, Bluetooth) inside such a thin box make the solution really universal and plug and play, with the largest choice of connected devices to deliver a full range of innovative servicesfrom home safety and security to family care, media & entertainment, video communication and more.
